summary: All previously blocking dependency/feasibility and traceability gaps appear to be addressed with concrete tasks and measurable acceptance criteria, and no new blocking issues were introduced.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Missing explicit inventory of canonical identifiers prior to stateful imports, risking forced replacement/drift and blocking 0-change plan
previous_issues_status.notes: Task 1.0 now inventories all key identifiers and explicitly requires 1.1 HCL to use exact values, aligning pre-import and post-import expectations.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Bootstrap Redis auth script dependency unclear and idempotency underspecified (create vs update secret; when to run relative to import)
previous_issues_status.notes: Task 1.2 now depends on replication group existing and being imported, specifies required inputs, create-or-update behavior, and explicit idempotency/no-op logic.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Health gates lacked a defined metric contract; alarms alone don’t guarantee deploy-ring.sh can compute/validate p99 and 5xx
previous_issues_status.notes: Task 2.2 defines metric sources and requires non-empty CloudWatch datapoints, plus documents the contract; deploy-ring.sh is correctly dependent on 2.2.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Invalid DNS validation using literal wildcard dig query
previous_issues_status.notes: Task 3.4 now queries a concrete name (test.agents...) and includes additional authoritative checks for agents and ACME delegation.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Registrar (Gandi) access not confirmed early, risking late-stage cutover/DNSSEC blockage
previous_issues_status.notes: Task 4.0 explicitly verifies NS edit capability, record export, DS management, and documents SLA and access/MFA confirmation.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Flatline findings SKP/IMP coverage not fully traceable (missing mappings for several IMP items)
previous_issues_status.notes: Traceability table now maps SKP-001..004 and IMP-001..010, including IMP-003/005/006/010, and states none are out of scope.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Risk mitigations referenced inconsistent/possibly incorrect SDD sections for import workflow and rollback
previous_issues_status.notes: Risk table now includes an explicit SDD Reference column with normalized §4.2/§4.3/§4.4 references and aligns with Sprint 1 import AC.
